pv38:10.3: Addasa nigrodhaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ → rukkhaṃ nigrodhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv38:26.4: niyatipariṇāmajaṃ → niyatipariṇāmajā (bj, pts-vp-pli2, mr); nīyati pariṇāmajaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
pv38:28.2: parassa → purisassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | chindate → chindite (sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1); chinde (mr)
pv38:29.1: Acchejjābhejjo hi → acchejjabhejjo (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); acchejjo abhejjo (sya1ed, sya2ed); acchejjabhejjo si (mr)
pv38:33.1: Cullāsīti → cūḷāsīti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr) | mahākappino → mahākappuno (bj, pts-vp-pli2)
pv38:39.1: Vassāni satasahassāni → vassasatasahassāni (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
pv38:56.1: Ophuṇāmi → opuṇāmi (bj, pts-vp-pli2); ophunāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); odhunāmi (pts-vp-pli1); opunāmi (?)
